name: European Committee for Co-operation of the Machine Tool Industries
membership: FAIB, SEAP, EPC, EFFRA, ManuFuture, EACD, CEN, ASTM,AIOTI, EFM
goal:
Mission:
- To facilitate a business environment (legislation, innovation, environment, skilled workforces,...) to market the most competitive manufacturing solutions worldwide.
- To promote a single European market open to global competition through harmonized worldwide standards.
- To ensure an equal European level playing field in complying to European standards.
- To encourage a research and innovation strategy driven by the present and future needs of the market.
- To foster innovation and integration of new technologies through involvement of industrial enterprises in national and European programmes.

Activities:
- To represent globally the common position of the European Machine Tool (MT) Industry.
- To promote the global presence of the European MT Industry, principally through the EMO exhibitions.
- To maintain a Market Intelligence Service gathering and distributing statistical and economic data and reports.
- To co-ordinate European and international standardization.
- To promote innovation and exploitation of research results.
- To promote co-operation with other international organisations.
interests: Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: we follow the ecodesign directive for machine tools industry in europe
